verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I stood <S%G2476><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sand <S%G285><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> sea, <S%G2281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> a beast <S%G2342><s%> rise up <S%G305><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea, <S%G2281><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> horns, <S%G2768><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G848><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> ten <S%G1176><s%> crowns, <S%G1238><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G848><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of blasphemy. <S%G988><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> like unto <S%G3664><s%> a leopard, <S%G3917><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> were as <S%G5613><s%> the feet of a bear, <S%G715><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of a lion: <S%G3023><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dragon <S%G1404><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> his <S%G848><s%> power, <S%G1411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> seat, <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> authority. <S%G1849><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> heads <S%G2776><s%> as it were <S%G5613><s%> wounded <S%G4969><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> death; <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> deadly <S%G2288><s%> wound <S%G4127><s%> was healed: <S%G2323><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G1093><s%> wondered <S%G2296><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beast. <S%G2342><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they worshiped <S%G4352><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dragon <S%G1404><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> beast: <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they worshiped <S%G4352><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beast, <S%G2342><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> is like unto <S%G3664><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> beast? <S%G2342><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to make war <S%G4170><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him? <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> there was given <S%G1325><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> a mouth <S%G4750><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> great things <S%G3173><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blasphemies; <S%G988><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> to continue <S%G4160><s%> forty and two <S%G5062><s%> <S%G1417><s%> months. <S%G3376><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he opened <S%G455><s%> his <S%G848><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> blasphemy <S%G988><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> to blaspheme <S%G987><s%> his <S%G848><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> tabernacle, <S%G4633><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them that dwell <S%G4637><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> it was given <S%G1325><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> war <S%G4171><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to overcome <S%G3528><s%> them: <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> kindreds, <S%G5443><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> tongues, <S%G1100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> nations. <S%G1484><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that dwell <S%G2730><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> shall worship <S%G4352><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> are not <S%G3756><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> book <S%G976><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Lamb <S%G721><s%> slain <S%G4969><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>
If any man <S%G1536><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

He that <S%G1536><s%> leadeth into <S%G4863><s%> captivity <S%G161><s%> shall go <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> captivity: <S%G161><s%> he that <S%G1536><s%> killeth <S%G615><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword <S%G3162><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be <S%G846><s%> killed <S%G615><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword. <S%G3162><s%> Here <S%G5602><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> saints. <S%G40><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I beheld <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%> coming up <S%G305><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth; <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> horns <S%G2768><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a lamb, <S%G721><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he spake <S%G2980><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a dragon. <S%G1404><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he exerciseth <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> causeth <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them which dwell <S%G2730><s%> therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> beast, <S%G2342><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> deadly wound <S%G848><s%> <S%G2288><s%> <S%G4127><s%> was healed. <S%G2323><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he doeth <S%G4160><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> wonders, <S%G4592><s%> so that <S%G2443><s%> he <S%G2532><s%> maketh <S%G4160><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> come down <S%G2597><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> deceiveth <S%G4105><s%> them that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the means of those miracles <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he had power <S%G1325><s%> <S%G846><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> beast; <S%G2342><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them that dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth, <S%G1093><s%> that they should make <S%G4160><s%> an image <S%G1504><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> beast, <S%G2342><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wound <S%G4127><s%> by a sword, <S%G3162><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> did live. <S%G2198><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he had power <S%G1325><s%> <S%G846><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> life <S%G4151><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> image <S%G1504><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> beast, <S%G2342><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> image <S%G1504><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%> should both <S%G2532><s%> speak, <S%G2980><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> cause <S%G4160><s%> that as many as <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> would not <S%G3361><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> image <S%G1504><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> beast <S%G2342><s%> should <S%G2443><s%> be killed. <S%G615><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he causeth <S%G4160><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> both small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great, <S%G3173><s%> <S%G2532><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> poor, <S%G4434><s%> <S%G2532><s%> free <S%G1658><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bond, <S%G1401><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> receive <S%G1325><s%> <S%G846><s%> a mark <S%G5480><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G848><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G848><s%> foreheads: <S%G3359><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> might <S%G1410><s%> buy <S%G59><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> sell, <S%G4453><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> he that had <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> mark, <S%G5480><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> beast, <S%G2342><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> number <S%G706><s%> of his <S%G848><s%> name. <S%G3686><s%>

Here <S%G5602><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> wisdom. <S%G4678><s%> Let him that hath <S%G2192><s%> understanding <S%G3563><s%> count <S%G5585><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> number <S%G706><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> beast: <S%G2342><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of a man; <S%G444><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G848><s%> number <S%G706><s%> is Six hundred threescore and six. <S%G5516><s%>
